Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, obligatory introduction post here, and this is my GundarkEars. Or something like that.

I\'m a longtime fan of KSP and I\'m super excited with the 0.16 release. I\'ve already tinkered with the new jet engines and I\'m very close to having a fleet of warbirds at the ready. Good to meet you all, and happy flying.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
